argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_neg1rr | |- -u 1 e. RR |
| 2 |  | #P_1re | |- 1 e. RR |
| 3 |  | #P_iccssre | |- ( ( -u 1 e. RR /\ 1 e. RR ) -> ( -u 1 [,] 1 ) C_ RR ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mp2an | |- ( -u 1 [,] 1 ) C_ RR |
| 5 | 4 | #P_sseli | |- ( A e. ( -u 1 [,] 1 ) -> A e. RR ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_recnd | |- ( A e. ( -u 1 [,] 1 ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_acosval | |- ( A e. CC -> ( arccos ` A ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. ( -u 1 [,] 1 ) -> ( arccos ` A ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_halfpire | |- ( _pi / 2 ) e. RR |
| 10 |  | #P_asinrecl | |- ( A e. ( -u 1 [,] 1 ) -> ( arcsin ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 11 |  | #P_resubcl | |- ( ( ( _pi / 2 ) e. RR /\ ( arcsin ` A ) e. RR ) -> ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) e. RR ) |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11 | #P_sylancr | |- ( A e. ( -u 1 [,] 1 ) -> ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) e. RR ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( A e. ( -u 1 [,] 1 ) -> ( arccos ` A ) e. RR ) |
